Comienza a buscar restaurantes
 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Restaurante } from 'src/app/auth/interfaces/restaurante.interfaces'; import { SearchService } from 'src/app/auth/services/search.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private searchService: SearchService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} searchTerm!: string; searchCityTerm!: string; results: any[] = []; search() { this.results = []; if (this.searchCityTerm === undefined) { this.searchCityTerm = 'Madrid'; } this.searchService .getRestaurantesPorCiudadYNombre(this.searchTerm, this.searchCityTerm) .subscribe((restaurantes: any) => { if (restaurantes.ok) { console.log(restaurantes); restaurantes.restaurantes.forEach((element: Restaurante) => { this.results.push(element); }); } }); console.log(this.results[0]); } }
